FileFormat.FormatDescription: An Amiga Disk File is the file format used by Amiga computers and emulators to store images of disks. It is a sector by sector dump of an Amiga formatted disk. It's uses include backup, disk virtualisation and game production.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: ‘DOS’ followed by ‘00|01|02|03|04|05|06|07’ depending on the format of the disk. More information on the internal signature can be found here: http://lclevy.free.fr/adflib/adf_info.html#p41
